casebody.data:
Partridge, Appellant, v. Rubin, Respondent. (Common Pleas of New York City and County,

General Term.

May 6, 1889.) Appeal from Second district court. Action by Josiah Partridge against Fanny Rubin. For decision on motion for reargument, see post, 957.

*956Argued before Larremore, C. J., and Allen and Bookstaver, JJ.

George Wilcox, for appellant. Good hart, Phillips <£■ Rosenhurg, for respondent.

Bo opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs.
